name: JF-13 AC Tone
details:
Amp Simulator of the Vox AC-30The Joyo AC Tone JF-13 pedal reproduces the sound of a Vox AC30 amplifier--that classic British rock sound all guitarists dream about. It has sparkly high end, like the Top Boost model, and works on Drive to about 7 for subtle forms of overdrive with harmonic overtones. Good for players who value a clean sound with a little warmth. It can also dirty up when drive is cranked hard to 9 or 10. Sounds really good direct.
Vox Style British Class A Amp Sim
Level, Voice, Drive controls
Voice control shapes overdrive character
Sturdy aluminum alloy case
Uses 9V battery or standard Boss style adapter
http://www.joyoaudio.com/en/product/show_111.html
